= Pacman =

== List of flags ==

| flag | explanation                   |
|------|-------------------------------|
| -S   | synchronize                   |
| -Sy  |                               |
| -Syu | system-wide update            |
| -R   |                               |
| -Rn  |                               |
| -Rns |                               |
| -Q   |                               |
| -U   | install package on the system |
| -V   | display version               |
